channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mini roundabout, Parton road, station road…outside Churchdown parish offices…several potholes ongoing, the road painters have painted white lines in the potholes this morning causing traffic to stop in dismay. Raised iron works and rutted surface causing traffic to swerve., 8th May
item.description:
Entrance to Churchdown parish council car park
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
